articles.description: The Covid pandemic has left Aussie tradies and handymen and women with more work than they can handle – and they’re laughing all the way to the bank.
articles.content: The outspoken Jims Mowing boss has revealed Aussie tradies are jacking up prices by more than 300 per cent as demand soars beyond belief.The Covid pandemic has left Aussie tradies and handymen and wo… [+4871 chars]
